name: Dr Affiliate
author: Rohit Urane

sections.description:
Affiliate marketing is the process of earning money (commissions) every time you promote a company’s products or services and drive a sale.
It is best way to track all affiliate links. you let to know how going work affiliate link? how best affiliate link for our site?
All Questions has one Solution i.e. Dr Affiliate.

Dr. Affiliate has great UI experience, User-Friendly UI, and is easy to understand. You add Mulitple Affiliate links to your site in an easy way.
You can perform CRUD operations on affiliate links accordingly. In Post editor, you easily add affiliate links to your post. you just need to press the ‘;’ key
and type a keyword which matches with the affiliate link title. Click that Options, Affiliate Link is added to your post.

That kind of easy to affiliate link on your article. you are ready to earn money from affiliate programs.

When the user clicks the affiliate Link and that link has set country-wise link by admin. In that case inside Plugin, we get the user’s ip address and find where user is located by Using third party API
Based on that user location, we redirect them to country wise link.

All Details on below Link:
https://rapidapi.com/neutrinoapi/api/ip-info/

Get location information about an IP address.
Depending on the specific IP address you can determine the country, region, city, longitude and latitude of the address.
Our high quality database for geolocation data is being constantly updated as the internet address allocation changes (the database is usually updated at least once per month).
This API can also be used to do reverse DNS (PTR) lookups.

Service’s Terms Link:
https://rapidapi.com/terms/

Service’s Privacy Link:
https://rapidapi.com/company/privacy-policy
sections.installation:
1. Upload Dr Affiliate to the wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate Dr Affiliate Plugin from Installed Plugin Page.
  3. We are ready to go use it. Add New Link from Dr Affiliate Menu.

Or

  1. Go to “Plugins” -> “Add New” Option -> Type “Dr Affiliate” in search box.
  2. Click To Install button and Activate Plugin.
  3. You will see “Dr Affiliate” Option to sidebar inside admin panel.
sections.faq:
Here are some common questions/problems.

My Links are not redirecting properly?

This is a common issue usually caused by another plugin or theme not flushing redirect rules correctly after setting up another custom post type.

To resolve the problem follow these steps:

  1. Deactivate Dr Affiliate.
  2. Activate Dr Affiliate
  3. Visit the Settings->Permalinks page and click save.
  4. Go back to Dr Affiliate->All Affiliate Links and view one of the links, it should be redirecting properly.

Affiliate Links are not appear on editor?

Don’t worry. This issue occurs beacause cache of browser. You just need to go All Posts and Press ctrl+r key.
Afterward, you can go to edit post or create new post. It works fine.
